name: Evil Intimates II
description:
|********************INTIMATES********************|

|1| SELECT & PLACE CHARGES |1|

|2| FIRE |2|

|3| EXTRACT |3|

|4| LOG OFF |4|

|********************INTIMATES********************|

CONTROLS

[ ] MOUSE & CLICK - Select charges and interact with control panel

[ ] UP,DOWN,LEFT,RIGHT - Movement for MotherLeopard

[ ] W,A,S,D - Movement for swimmer and extract avatar

[ ] SPACE - Dive

[ ] E - Extract asset

TRAILER
